activities.name: copy-files-to-datalake
activities.description: This web activity calls logic app flow to copy files from sharepoint to azure datalake

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT * from @{pipeline().parameters.ConfigTable} where isActive='True'
IF @@ROWCOUNT = 0 THROW 50000,'No rows in configuration table!',1

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
